text: 1:16 1 Timoti 6:2Ezɨ datɨrɨghɨn nɨ pura ingangarir gumazir kɨnimɨn a gɨnɨghnɨghan markɨ. Bar puvatɨ. A pura nɨn ingangarir gumazir kɨnim, egha datɨrɨghɨn a bar nɨn aveghbuamra, ezɨ nɨ bar a gifuegham. Kɨ uabɨ an garima a Kraisɨn anav, ezɨ kɨ uan navim isava a ganɨngi. Kamaghɨn kɨ fo, nɨ bar a gifuegham. Nɨ an arazir a pura ingangarir gumazir kɨnim mɨn ikiava amim gifuegham. Egh Ekiamɨn aven nɨ aveghbuamɨn mɨn an ganɨva bar a gifuegham.
